data.text: The willingness to win at any cost, or overturn an election by any means necessary because your candidate of choice lost, is a major crack in that damn. I am not optimistic about the future survival of our Republic.

A mutual and willing respect for the "rule of law" as codified by the US Constitution is all that separates us from the anarchy and chaos that has routinely engulfed much of the rest of the world over the past few centuries.
I think some folks lose sight of the fact that the "American Experiment" is just that--an experiment, and experiments often fail.
